title: BONUS: Ruthie Bolton
description: Cari Champion sits down with two-time Olympic Gold Medalist Ruthie Bolton to discuss how she dealt with an abusive marriage, overcoming challenges to achieve success both on and off the court and much more.
itunes:title: BONUS: Ruthie Bolton
itunes:author: ESPN, ESPNW, Cari Champion
itunes:subtitle: Cari Champion sits down with two-time Olympic Gold Medalist Ruthie Bolton to discuss how she dealt with an abusive marriage, overcoming challenges to achieve success both on and off the court and much more.
